title: Kubernetes version history
pageDescription: The VK Cloud platform provides several versions of Kubernetes for use in cloud clusters. Here you will find a detailed history of the Kubernetes versions that are supported or have been supported in the past. For each version, a brief description of changes in the VK Cloud service and in Kubernetes itself are presented.
shortDescription: Which versions of Kubernetes are or have been supported in the past for VK Cloud clusters and what has changed in them.
markdown: The VK Cloud platform provides several versions of Kubernetes for use in cloud clusters.
